conbody.p: The "Database Manager" window in "Preferences" displays all available database collections. Each database collection is reflected by a line in the table. The number of documents per collection is shown in the column "DB Doc Count".

The "Database Manager" window automatically opens with each BTS start, if there are any problems with the index. To work with the databases and to enable search queries, the databases have to be indexed properly. Re-index all databases when they appear either in yellow or red (see ).
